unnormalised: Breaking News: Deshant Navya Sarkari ID Niyamaan Sarke Bhanvat!
normalised: Breaking News: Nation Grips Foreheads Over New Government I-D Rule!

unnormalised: Eka cholneant jem Bollywood kathanaak porosui vhodd twist dita, Kendra Sarkaran suchoileam ki tumchem PAN card (tem ABCDE1234F sarkhem alphanumeric code aslem, zannam nastoleam khatir) tumchea Aadhaar numberak (12 ankantlem ascharya, 1234-5678-9012 sarkhem) zoddchem Chandni Chowkant borem parking sthan sodhchea poros chodd mhotvachem.
normalised: Ek novo ghallmell: Kendra Sarkaran Navi Sarkari I-D Niyamacher Dhakkan Dharlam!

unnormalised: Ho, lokanno, tumi sarkem aikolem. Antim tarik, ji poilim 30/06/2023 mhunn tharaili asli, ti vaddounk ailea. Portun ek fautt. Ashi batmi asa, ki vadd diunk ailim, karann desantlea adhya lokank aplea Aadhaar numberachi vollokh dhorunkui tankam zaina asli, tantunt tannek zoddunk kiteak mevta. Novi 'Kara vo Mara' tarik atam 31/03/2024. Tumchea calendarancher nishaann korun dhorat, lokanno, tem novea Bollywood filmachea udhghatanak porosui chodd mhotvachem.
normalised: Ek ghallmell ji Bollywood film-achem katho astaa tacher-ui anik modd aasaa, Kendra Sarkaran sanglaa ki tumchen P-A-N card (A-B-C-D-E-one-two-three-four-F kaslea alphanumeric code-achi vostu, zanchi suruwat naahi tankam) tumchea Aadhaar numberak (bara ank-achi kamal, one-two-three-four-five-six-seven-eight-nine-zero-one-two) Chandni Chowk-ar ek bori parking zagaa mellchea-thaan anik-ui important zaleam.

unnormalised: "Tem tumchea boreakhatir!" dhos dilem Mantralayantlea ek unknown manxanne, maaf kora, Finance, cha gheunk astanna. Distaa, hi zoddni-kathaa services sarak korunk ani dusht arthik ghotalekarank thambounkhatir asa. Karann, tumkam khobor asli ki gunnegar aplea IDsak sarkhe zoddttat gunnegar korchea poilim.
normalised: Hoi, lokanno, tumi barem aiklaam. Mukhel tarikh, ji poilen tees June don hazar ani teis aslee, ti vaddoun dhalea. Ani punn eka pavtim. Aishi khabar asa ki, vaddoun dilem karann deshachen aadhe lok aplem Aadhaar number uzoon kaddchem prayatn kortalee, tanchea-thaan link korchem kaddee asa? Navi ‘Karaa naa mar’ tariikh tees ek March don hazar ani chaar asa. Tumchea calendar-ar mark karaa, lokanno, hachem mahatva latest Bollywood film yetee tacher jaast asa.

unnormalised: Pun, social media memes-an bhurun ailea. Eka popular memeant ek nagrik dukhan bhorun apli dolli dista, to portun ek password ugddas dovrunk sodhtaa, ani ek sweet message disun yeta: "Tumcho PAN number bhara (ABCDE1234F)". Satyata disturbing asa, frankly.
normalised: “Tem tumche bhaleak!" Bewilderment, maaph kara, Finance Mantralayanlea ek gumnaam manas, chai ghetana ulolem. Dikhlaa ki hee linking-achi kahani sab sarkaarachim sevaa sopee karunk ani tee badmash financial fraudster-ak ravounk karunk-ache aahe. Tumka zannam, aparadhi dhyan-an aplem I-Ds link kortat crime korchea poilem.

unnormalised: Kitem zatolem tumi antim tarik chukta zalear? Khorench sangunk zalear tumchem PAN card chocolate tea-pot sarkhem vaprunk nastolem zatolem. Tem "inoperative" zatolem, je bureaucratic jargon "utterly useless" khatir vapurta. Tech khatir tumi tumche income tax returns bharnunk xokona, bank account ugddunk xokona, vo dhon gheunk tumcho cousin tumkam sangta tea 'get-rich-quick' schemant invest korunk xokona.
normalised: Punn, social media meme-ani bharaun gelaam. Ek prasiddh meme-ar dekhaita ki ek nagarik kanant steam yetee asa, punn aani ek password yaad korchea vellar, ani ek dostanaa message pop up zaata: "Tumchem P-A-N number (A-B-C-D-E-one-two-three-four-F) bhara." Sachai kharab zaata, sachchem.

unnormalised: Pun thamba, ani thor asa! Tumche IDs zoddunk tumchea registered mobile numberacher ek OTP pattoonk podta. Tem, khorench sangunk zalear tumchea kodden to phone number astolem je tumkam Aadhaar card kaddttana aslem, ani tumi tumcho phone harounk na, tumcho number bodlunk na, vo lassinchea bucketant tumchea phoneak thambounk na.
normalised: Ki zaataa zaleaar tumhi mukhel tariikh chukle? Chalo assa ki tumchem P-A-N card chocolate teapot jitkem upyogi jaatel. Tem "inoperative" zaatel, ja bureaucracy-achem jargon "utterly useless" zaata. Hea-thaan tumhi tumchem income tax return bharaunk shaknaa, bank account ugddounk shaknaa, naa te lucrative ‘get-rich-quick’ scheme-ar invest korunk shaknaa ji tumchea cousin tuka ulaita asta.

unnormalised: Tech khatir, India bharaun cholat! Tem khub bhirantichem, visronk ailele numbers sodhnnean bhorlelem, confuse korpi sarkari website-an bhorlelem, ani digital yugant tumchi jagachi chikitsa korunk bhorlelem zatolem. Ani yad dovrat, tumka duba astana, sarkari systemacher dhos divn pani puri khaun yeyat. Tumka tem boreponn gheunk mevta!
normalised: Punn rava, anik aasa! Tumchea I-Ds link korcheak ek O-T-P pan tumchea register kelolea mobile number-ar paatounk poddta. Hachem matalab assa ki tumchea-kade tee phone number aasaa ji tumchea-kade poilech Aadhaar card ghetona aasaa, ani tumi aaplem phone haroonaakaa, number badalonaakaa, naa tuka lassi-achea bucket-ar dharonaakaa.

unnormalised: Ani tumkam azeib zalear PAN card kitem, tumchea khatir khobor asa: tumchem PAN card ek 10-character alphanumeric identifier asa, tumchi arthik fingerprint sarkhem. Tem arthik transactionank mhotvachem, tax bharnneak ani bank account ugddunk. Tumchem PAN card inactive zalear, tumi tem kitem korunk xokona.
normalised: Hea-thaan, India, tumhi tayar ravaa! Hee bori yaatra zaatel jaanta tumhi uzolele numbers soddun kadtle, sarkaarachim website-an bharaun zatlet, ani tumchen digital yug-ar kitem sthan asa tache visheent chinta zatet. Ani yaad thewaa, tumhi dukhent aslet tor systemacher dosh dyanaa ani ekaa plate-ar pani puri khaawa. Tum tachi laiki karta!

unnormalised: Disclaimer: Hi satirical news snippet asa. Please sarkari website-ancher vishvas thevn sarki khobor ghevn ani antim tarek PAN-Aadhaar zoddunk vaparat. Ani tumcho phone lassinchea bucketant harounchonnaka.
normalised: Ani zaleaar tumi ajun chintaitaa ki P-A-N card kitem assaa, hanchi mahiti aasaa: tumchem P-A-N card dhak-achi alphanumeric identifier aasaa, te tumchen financial fingerprint-achem thoddem jachem asa. Te sab financial transaction-ank, tax bhartana bank account ughtana-ank important aasaa. Zaleaar tumchem P-A-N card inoperative zaleat, tumhi hachi kitem korunk shaknaa.
Disclaimer: Hee ek has-achi news snippet aasaa. Sach-achi mahiti ani P-A-N-Aadhaar link korchea mukhel tarikhanchea visheent sarkari websites-ak vichara. Ani tumchen phone lassint dharonaakaa.
